title.rendered: Fall 2023 College Fair at SSHS on September 28

content.rendered:
On September 28, Saratoga Springs High School will host a College Fair in partnership with CASDA.  The vent will be held from 6:30 – 8 p.m. in the Blue Gym.

View the list of school representatives attending.

excerpt.rendered: On September 28, Saratoga Springs High School will host a College Fair in partnership with CASDA.  The vent will be held from 6:30 – 8 p.m. in the Blue Gym. View the list of school representatives attending.
